mil6.1.4:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, yadā bodhisatto dukkarakārikaṁ akāsi, netādiso aññatra ārambho
mil6.1.4:1.1_1: ahosi nikkamo kilesayuddhaṁ maccusenaṁ vidhamanaṁ āhārapariggaho dukkarakārikā, evarūpe
mil6.1.4:1.1_2: parakkame kiñci assādaṁ alabhitvā tameva cittaṁ parihāpetvā evamavoca ‘na kho panāhaṁ
mil6.1.4:1.1_3: imāya kaṭukāya dukkarakārikāya adhigacchāmi uttari manussadhammaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ,
mil6.1.4:1.1_4: siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’ti, tato nibbinditvā aññena maggena sabbaññutaṁ patto,
mil6.1.4:1.1_5: puna tāya paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti.
mil6.1.4:3.1: Kena nu kho, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇena tathāgato yāya paṭipadāya attanā nibbinno virattarūpo, tattha sāvake anusāsati samādapetī”ti?
mil6.1.4:4.1: “Tadāpi, mahārāja, etarahipi sāyeva paṭipadā, taṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā bodhisatto sabbaññutaṁ patto.
mil6.1.4:4.2: Api ca, mahārāja, bodhisatto ativīriyaṁ karonto niravasesato āhāraṁ uparundhi.
mil6.1.4:4.4: So tena dubbalyena nāsakkhi sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇituṁ, so mattamattaṁ kabaḷīkārāhāraṁ sevanto tāyeva paṭipadāya nacirasseva sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil6.1.4:4.5: Sāyeva, mahārāja, paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya.
mil6.1.4:5.1: Yathā, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ āhāro upatthambho, āhārūpanissitā sabbe sattā sukhaṁ anubhavanti;
mil6.1.4:5.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, sāyeva paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya,
mil6.1.4:5.2_1: neso, mahārāja, doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena tathāgato
mil6.1.4:5.2_2: tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso, sadā
mil6.1.4:6.1: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso addhānaṁ ativegena gaccheyya, tena so pakkhahato vā bhaveyya pīṭhasappī vā asañcaro pathavitale.
mil6.1.4:6.2: Api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāpathaviyā doso atthi, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti?
mil6.1.4:6.4: sadā paṭiyattā, bhante, mahāpathavī, kuto tassā doso?
mil6.1.4:6.5: Vāyāmasseveso doso, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti.
mil6.1.4:6.6_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa,
mil6.1.4:6.6_1: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso
mil6.1.4:7.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso kiliṭṭhaṁ sāṭakaṁ nivāseyya, na so taṁ dhovāpeyya, neso doso udakassa, sadā paṭiyattaṁ udakaṁ.
mil6.1.4:7.3_0: Evameva kho, mahārāja, neso doso ārambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena
mil6.1.4:7.3_1: tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso,
mil6.1.4:7.3_2: sadā paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā, tasmā tathāgato tāyeva paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati
mil6.1.4:7.3_3: samādapeti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja, sadā paṭiyattā anavajjā sā paṭipadā”ti.
